####Preparatory phase

load the required packages:
```{r}
library(datasets)
library(lattice)
library(plyr)
```

load the data:
```{r}
data(ToothGrowth)
```

####Exploratory analysis

plot a box-and-wisker plot:
```{r}
bwplot(len~factor(dose)|supp,data=ToothGrowth)
```
